TopicTitle: Just a simple reminder re trolls

Articles.Content:
They are not unhappy about the "buggy" product/update--they are merely irked, annoyed, puzzled, and plainly angry at those who can FIND HAPPINESS despite the bugs, because they are incapable of doing that.

-RODION
I find that their butthurt lotion makes my hands feel much better after a long day of being a BOSS.

I find that their butthurt lotion makes my hands feel much better after a long day of being a BOSS.

"Butthurt lotion"

Oh god my sides are orbiting Jool right now

So people waited for something with less features than promised that was released 2 months later than it should have, and when they have even a slight complaint about it they're "butthurt"?

I like the update, I do. But it's not what it should have been by any stretch.

Grow up and get real.
lolwut. Nothing was ever promised by a certain date. If you don't like alphas then go play something else until it's done.
Not having another one of these. Threads like this turn into pointless arguments and flamewars.
